name: Space [LEAKED PROTOTYPE]
description:
Puzzsoft's "Space", a tour de force of random levels, wherein you shoot bullets at things that wrap around planets. Good Luck!

Space is vast, and full of bullets that can orbit around planets. Shoot your way through a variety of levels all riffing on that basic idea.

Space was an experimental game Puzzsoft created but never released, until now.

It may be confounding, frustrating, and upsetting. (Try the PC download if the browser version is being particularly difficult)

It is best experienced in The Puzzsoft Museum of Time And Space, a companion piece which will give you the proper context, history, and controls to fully appreciate the piece. Try it, it's free!
